text: Gaa dae loo gi di king aamua ga haga noho goodou i lodo di guongo gadoo be di godou guongo donu, dela iei nia hadagee waini e gaamai ana waini, gei ono ‘wheat’ e hai nia palaawaa. Tenua dela la nia huwa olib, lolo olib, mono mee maangala ‘honey’ i golo. Maa goodou gaa hai gii hai be ana helekai, gei goodou ga hagalee mmade, ga mouli. Hudee dumaalia gi Hezekiah gi halahalau ina goodou bolo Dimaadua ga benebene laa goodou.
